## Gene Details:
- **Gene ID:** [AT4G27585](https://www.arabidopsis.org/locus?name=AT4G27585)
- **Gene Symbol:** <u>AtSLP1, SLP1</u>
- **Gene Name:** stomatin-like protein 1
- **Description:**   SPFH/Band 7/PHB domain-containing membrane-associated protein family;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** 
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*
